name: Win The Game
storyline: As the character Shinobu, put yourself into your very own Battle Royale-inspired murder game. You will start the game with some food rations and a random weapon. You can get anything from a shoe to a flame thrower. Try to kill everybody within the set time limit, or find if there's another way off the island.
summary: You wake up on a remote island with a weapon and a message to "win the game." Fight for your life against your fellow students in this murder game inspired by Battle Royale & The Hunger Games
